attributes.action: Take action on Knife and Gun Crime in Britain!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On May 10th 2008, Jimmy Mizen became the 13th youth to be killed as a result of knife crime in London since the turn of the year.

Enough is Enough.

Please sign this petition to urge the government to take action!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
